Content: The Only 2-in-1 Tongue Cleaner – Brush & Scraper for a maximum clean!Designed for maximum cleaning with two rows of bristles and scrapers.One side features two rows of bristles for brushing.The other side features two rows of scrapers for scraping.Effectively designed to remove the maximum amount of plaque and bacteria.Soft, sturdy bristles and multiple, curved ridges trap and gently dislodge and remove plaque to clean tongue.Comfortable narrow head minimizes gag reflex.Ergonomically-d...
